CARS.UNKNOWN_SERVER_ERROR: A server error occured. Try later.

USER.UNKNOWN_SERVER_ERROR: A server error occured. Try later.

LOGIN.LOGIN_FAILED_SERVER_ERROR: Login failed - server error, try later.
LOGIN.LOGIN_FAILED_NONAUTHENTICATED: Wrong username or password, try again.
LOGIN.LOGIN_FAILED_LOCKED: Login disabled from security reasons. Try later.
LOGIN.LOGIN_FAILED_DISABLED: Login disabled from security reasons. Contact technical support.
LOGIN.LOGIN_FAILED_PASSWORD_LENGTH: The length of the password is not too enough
LOGIN.LOGIN_FAILED_BRANCH_NULL: The user is not in the any branch. Contact technical support or manager.
LOGIN.LOGIN_FAILED_UNKNOWN: Login failed - unknown error. Contact technical support.

RESERVATIONS.END_DATE_BEFORE_START_DATE: End date is set before start date
RESERVATIONS.RESERVATION_IN_THE_PAST: It is not allowed to add reservation to the past
RESERVATIONS.UNKNOWN_SERVER_ERROR: A server error occured. Try later.
